'''Supervibrato Lightning Release Swords''' is a form of chakra flow used by [[Killer B]], often alongside his [[Acrobat|signature kenjutsu]] and his [[Kumogakure Swords|preferred blades]]. 

Even when applied to a pencil, the channeling of [[lightning]]-natured chakra increases its vibrating frequency and hence its piercing and cutting power, to an extent that exceeds those of standard [[Wind Release]] techniques.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 470, page 12</ref> A sword empowered by this chakra flow proved capable of blocking [[Sword of Kusanagi (Sasuke Uchiha)|another sword]] even [[Sword of Kusanagi: Chidori Katana|imbued with the Chidori]],<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 411, pages 17</ref> which was considered impossible to defend against.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 411, page 16</ref><ref>''Naruto'' chapter 308, page 9, panel 3</ref> However, if the chakra flow is absorbed before the flowed object pierces, the added potency will have no effect.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 470, page 13</ref> 

== Trivia ==
* Although the name of this technique implies a sword, ''[[Jin no Sho]]'' indicates this is the method of chakra flow, used even on other objects.
